Class DevicePresets

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.apps.physics.spintronics.DevicePresets
public class DevicePresets extends Object
Predefined spintronic device configurations. Provides ready-to-use structures for common applications.

    SOT-MRAM structure with heavy metal underlayer.
